comment: " This month , the first person to obtain a legal " non-binary " sex designation has successfully petitioned the court originally responsible for his " non-binary " status to order that the sex on his birth certificate be restored to " male . " <URL>
amr:
# ::snt " This month , the first person to obtain a legal " non-binary " sex designation has successfully petitioned the court originally responsible for his " non-binary " status to order that the sex on his birth certificate be restored to " male . " <URL>
(p / petition-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                  :value 1)
            :ARG0-of (o2 / obtain-01
                  :ARG1 (d / designate-01
                        :ARG1 p2
                        :ARG2 (s / sex)
                        :mod (b / binary
                              :polarity -)
                        :ARG1-of (l / legal-02))))
      :ARG1 (c / court
            :ARG1-of (r / responsible-01
                  :ARG2 (s2 / status
                        :mod (b2 / binary
                              :polarity -)
                        :poss p2)
                  :mod (o3 / original))
            :ARG0-of r)
      :ARG2 (o4 / order-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (r2 / restore-02
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (s3 / sex
                        :location (c2 / certificate
                              :mod (b3 / bear-02
                                    :ARG1 p2)))
                  :ARG2 (m / male)))
      :ARG1-of (s4 / succeed-01
            :ARG0 p2)
      :time (m2 / month
            :mod (t / this)))

comment: Followers , and allies in the fight against harmful gender ideology , I am proud to announce that my male birth sex and given name have now been legally reclaimed . The Alliance Defending Freedom ( ADF ) graciously assisted me with this important matter . Please disseminate this news .
amr:
# ::snt Followers , and allies in the fight against harmful gender ideology , I am proud to announce that my male birth sex and given name have now been legally reclaimed . The Alliance Defending Freedom ( ADF ) graciously assisted me with this important matter . Please disseminate this news .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / pride-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (a / announce-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (r / reclaim-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (s / sex-01
                                    :ARG0 ii
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / male)
                                    :ARG2-of (b / bear-02
                                          :ARG1 ii))
                              :op2 (n / name
                                    :ARG1-of (g / give-01
                                          :ARG2 ii)))
                        :manner (l / law)
                        :time (n2 / now))))
      :snt2 (a3 / assist-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization
                  :name n
                  :op1 "Alliance"
                  :op2 "Defending"
                  :op3 "Freedom"))
      :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
      :ARG2 (m3 / matter
            :ARG1-of (ii3 / important-01)
            :mod (t / this))
      :manner (g2 / grateful)
      :snt3 (d / disseminate-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (n3 / news
                  :mod t)))
